name: Mark S. HALPERN, Esquire, Halpern & Levy, P.C., Petitioners v. John F. BROWN, Jr., Esquire, and Lynne Boghossian, Respondents

parties: Mark S. HALPERN, Esquire, Halpern & Levy, P.C., Petitioners v. John F. BROWN, Jr., Esquire, and Lynne Boghossian, Respondents

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 15th day of September, 2016, Petitioners’ Emergency Petition for Grant of Extraordinary Jurisdiction is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
157 A.3d 485
Mark S. HALPERN, Esquire, Halpern & Levy, P.C., Petitioners v. John F. BROWN, Jr., Esquire, and Lynne Boghossian, Respondents
No. 145 EM 2016
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
September 15, 2016
